Software for Math Research #

Search services #

  • swMATH: information service for mathematical software

  • National Institute of Standards: Guide to Available Mathematical Software

  • Sagemath #

    SageMath is a free open-source mathematics software system licensed under the GPL. It builds on top of many existing open-source packages NumPy SciPy matplotlib Sympy Maxima GAP FLINT R and many more. Access their combined power through a common, Python-based language or directly via interfaces or wrappers

By Field #

Algebra #

  • GAP - Groups, Algorithms, Programming - a System for Computational Discrete Algebra
  • Cadabra - computer algebra system for field-theory
  • Singular - commutative and non-commutative algebra, algebraic geometry, and singularity theory.

Algebraic Geometry #

Analysis #

  • Macaulay2: for algebraic geometry and commutative algebra

Applied Mathematics #

  • GNU Octave: numerical computation, similar to MATLAB.
  • Scilab: open source alternative to MATLAB

Combinatorics #

Dynamical Systems #

Geometry and Topology #

  • Computational Geometry Software Collection
  • Topology Software Collection
  • Regina: 3 and 4-manifolds with a focus on triangulations, knots and links, normal surfaces, and angle structures

  • PARI/GP: falgebraic number theory
